Name: Spellbook Demonslayers
About the game: Spellbook Demonslayers is a roguelite horde survival game inspired by Vampire Survivors and Path of Exile : Choose your character, combine new spells & upgrades each run to defeat thousands of demons, then use your rewards to become stronger & faster. Your spells are cast automatically, so you can get straight into the demon-slaying action! Check Out What's New in Early Access! We hope all of you can enjoy Spellbook Demonslayers and your support will definitely change our life and encourage more tiny teams like Xendra &Erabit to keep trying to bring you more new & unique game experience. THANK YOU! We promise to continue working hard on the game and doing our best to balance and expand on the core gameplay! /
